Room.Name: Marina Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Marina Way, west of the Regal House of Silver.
Room.LongDescription: Silver is a valuable commodity in Oceancrest, although not as valuable as gold or as useful as adamantine. Nevertheless, the Regal House of Silver does some fine craftsmanship in weapons, armors and even some fancy houseware items like candlesticks and silverware.
